dialog-act01.name: Mage 01
messages:
I test the action CHECK_ENTITY_BYTE.
Please Set my 15th Byte to '2'
and I should begin spinning.

dialog-act02.name: Mage 02
messages:
I test the action CHECK_SAVE_FLAG.
This system still needs to be implemented.

dialog-act03.name: Mage 03
messages:
I test the action CHECK_IF_ENTITY_IS_IN_GEOMETRY.
If you stand in the tile labeled '03'
I should begin spinning.

dialog-act04.name: Mage 04
messages:
I test the action CHECK_FOR_BUTTON_PRESS.
If you press up on the right joystick
I should begin spinning.

dialog-act05.name: Mage 05
messages:
I test the action CHECK_FOR_BUTTON_STATE.
Hold down MEM0 about 1 second
after this dialog window closes
and I should begin spinning.

dialog-act06.name: Mage 06
messages:
I test the action RUN_SCRIPT.
As soon as you close this dialog
I should begin spinning.
